choices: You taste like cheese and he eats you
154121.content: Dan lying on his bed wiggling his sweaty toes felt air rushing out of his mouth and let out a loud *BURRRRPPP* You were flung like a rag doll amongst the stomach juices and the scent of lunch landing on his stomach with a wet slap. Dan felt you land on his gurgling stomach and grinned. "So you lived LITTLE DUDE!" He boomed. He picked you up whilst looking at his socked feet. "Since you'll probably escape my belly again how about I give you another task besides becoming my lunch!" You plead for mercy but he didnt care. He peeled open a hole in his sock and the smell emerged a greasy cheesy boy smell entombed your body and he slapped you into his sole releasing the sock and trapping you on the large appendage. He wiggled his toes which made you squirm against the soaking sock and foot. "I see you're Liking the smell! Well it'll only get worse!" As he bent his leg and you were pressed against the mattress...
154121.title: Burped sending you flying

1541211.content:
Dan rubs his foot back and forth over the mattress. You were pressed against his stinking and sweaty sole and thought that this is the place where you died. Crushed and smeared under the foot of your worst school enemy, but Dan had other plans for you. He raised his foot and gets you out of his sock. This ordeal has almost brought you to your limit, your whole body hurts and the disgusting smell of Dan's foot is still sticking to you. He brings you very close to his face and smells to you. "Mh, you smell better now than before ... if you taste better now?" Dan pulls his tongue out and licks you once from bottom to top, his saliva sticks to your face and at all other places on your front. Then he looks at you with a big smile. You immediately realize what that means, you will go back to his stomach and this time there will probably be no rescue. Dan realizes what is going on inside you. "Yeah right PIPSQUEAK, you know what's going to happen right now, but first I'll show you something, after all you will not be able to see it tomorrow HAHAHA". While you are firmly in his grip, Dan gets up and leaves the room. You wonder what he wants to show you, as if that had any meaning now? Dan is holding you to his stomach as you walk so you can not see where it's going. You can hear the growl of his stomach as he waits eagerly for your return. Then Dan stretches out his arm and you see what he wanted to show you. Below you can see the huge, open mouth of the toilet. "Look, in a toilet, your journey will end tomorrow, I'll wait until I'm at school before I go shit, so I can show everyone what happened to the little one I had for lunch, the others will laugh heartily, Especially your brother when I tell him that you were the little thing. " You look in the toilet, disgust and panic come over you. So shall it ends? Why should your brother be happy if Dan ... no, you do not want to think about that. You do not want to be eaten by this guy. You have to escape somehow, but your body is far too weak for that.
Dan watched with joy as you fight against this idea and had an idea. He went back to his room with you and dropped you onto his bed. That would be your chance to escape but your limbs hurt too much. "If you try to escape, I'll bite your legs off and eat them, you worm." Then Dan takes off his pants in front of you and turns around. You look at his bare ass now. "Do you like what you see, can you imagine what's happening to you?" Your hatred of Dan has never been greater than in this moment. The idea that you will die in this guy, digestive in his stomach makes you cry. When Dan sees that, he laughs and points a finger at his butt. That's going to be your new home soon, well, at least for a part of you ... "Dan bends his butt over you like he wants to sit down and stays just a few inches over you stand. You're looking straight at his asshole. "... the other part of you, I'm going to push out of my asshole tomorrow at school, maybe another part of you will go to that one too ..." and that leaves Dan a huge fart, at least for you. The smell is too much for you and you lose consciousness.
When you come back to consciousness, you see Dan eating a slice of pizza right now. "Hey Pipsqueak, wake up again, well, it would not have been fun to swallow you when you're unconscious, I've set up your temporary apartment with half a pizza, the rest will come as soon as you're inside." Dan takes you by your foot and lifts you over his head. "Have fun in my stomach and just do not get knocked out so fast again .. You have to think long and hard about what is coming now while I digest you HAHAHA" Dan opens his mouth and lets you fall into it. With a loud GULP you slide down his spit again and land in the pizza-filled stomach of your worst enemy. "Always nice to eat you Pipsqueak, even if it's the last time HAHA" sounds Dans voice from the outside. So that's it now, devoured by your worst enemy, soon digested by him to nothing more than shit, farts and some fat on his ass. As these pictures go through your mind, Dan buries you under the other half of the pizza.
The next day...
Dan stood by his friends, as well as your brother as Dan left a loud and stinking fart. Everyone laughed aloud and wondered what Dan had eaten so his farts stink like that? Dan then said, "Well that's the shrunken boy from yesterday's noon. Come with me, I'll let him out now." Everyone followed Dan to the bathroom. Once there, Dan immediately started pushing you out of his ass. After a while he was done, he wiped himself and looked into the toilet. Dan laughed as he saw your bare bones in his shit. Everyone came into the toilet cubicle and thought the sight was just as funny.
1541211.title: You taste like cheese and he eats you

1541212.content:
Dan chuckles as he slowly removes his sock.

He was right, of course, it IS getting worse!

Dan lowers his foot, toes wiggling at you. "Now...
1541212.title: He has fun with you.

154122.content:
"HEY PIPSQUEAK, TIME TO DIE!" Dan's voice bellowed from above you. Helpless in his dark hot cavernous stomach, you shrieked in pain and fear as acids started to digest you. Dan smirked and laid down to digest his little snack. You cried out in pain and humiliation. Your worst enemy had eaten you and you were going to part of him forever, or at least until...
The next day, Dan took a crap in the school bathroom. He smirked again as he wiped, got up and looked down at your floating remains.
"Looks like you learned your place, you little piece of SHIT!" He left the toilet unflushed and walked away.
154122.title: Did nothing

155.content: "Whew." You say to yourself. "That scared the crap out of me..." You continue to run down the hall, but barely make any progress, your really small. Oh what happened this morning...what....what...oh I don't know. How could this happen. Like said, nothing happened this morning.
155.title: No one, it was just a pair of shoes
